it.unicaltales.businesslogic.gameinfo

Class GlobalValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicaltales.businesslogic.gameinfo.GlobalValues
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GlobalValues
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Author:
    rodolfo Class that contains static game information such as: Window size, game API, scores, and global informations...
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DEFAULT_LAUNCHER

        public static boolean DEFAULT_LAUNCHER
        This value told to us, if we re running the application with the default launcher project, or we are running the project in different singular mode. It is automatically set by GameLauncher
        See Also:
        is useful for libgdx implementation, because Libgdx desktop implementation has a different folder level, and if we launch it with reflection the asset path changes

        public String getAssetPath(String asset)
        This function gets the path of resources of a file
        Parameters:
        asset - in which we find the complete path
        Returns:
        the complete path of sprite

      • getAssetPathOfNonInterlaccedFile

        public String getAssetPathOfNonInterlaccedFile(String asset)
        This function gets the path of resources of a file, that can bee interlacced or not (Useful for swing/awt)
        Parameters:
        asset - in which we find the complete path
        Returns:
        the complete path of sprite

        public String getResourcesPath()
        This function gets the path of resources
        Returns:
        the resource path dependently by framework
